# Installation Guide

= Installation =

The "Trim Trailing Space" extension to Oracle's JDeveloper IDE is installed in the standard way, which involves the following steps:

  # Launch [http://www.oracle.com/technology/jdev Oracle JDeveloper]
  # Select the Help -> Check for Updates... menu option http://dl.dropbox.com/u/191565/jdev/check-for-updates.png
  # When selecting the Source location, check "Open Source and Partners Extensions"
  # In the resulting list, check the Trim Trailing Space option
  # Finish, and follow any instructions given by Oracle JDeveloper
